Text:
This is a book to be treasured and re-read over the years -- one of the great novels of ideas published in the 20th century.  For the attentive reader, there will always be new depths revealed.

Many thanks for another superb upload, one that will hopefully introduce Mann to a new generation of readers.

@penfag - Thanks for suggesting Mann originally. Now I have to buckle down and start reading him.

Let me know if you find any errors in these uploads -- missing pages, out of order pages, missing punctuation, missing text, pages not aligned properly, etc. I'll fix whatever it's possible to fix.
Wow!, I am looking forward to more of your releases
